players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice's death is the first clue. Bob, you were last to see her – let's discuss who might have killed her."
Diana: "Bob, you were last to see Alice and I'm the detective. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Please vote to arrest you."
You: "I was the last to see Alice, but I didn't kill her. Maybe Charlie had motive and did it."
Charlie: "Diana, thanks for the info. Bob, you were last to see Alice and you are mafia. Vote for Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Alice; maybe Charlie did. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Bob was last to see Alice and I investigated him – mafia. Charlie's claim is correct. Please vote Bob."
